I told her about @themodernferret and she proceeded to tell ALL her friends at school that she was going to have a â€˜ferret birthday partyâ€™ (whatever that is ðŸ˜‚). Anyway, I ended up having her and her siblings, her mom, and some of her friends over to learn all about Elijah the ferret! It was so fun! I love teaching people about this awesome animal! entry.title: Ferret, wild animal rescue thrives in Brandy Station - Inside NoVA
entry.summary: Little did Karen Lamb know stepping into a pet store in Virginia over 25 years ago would change the direction of her life forever.Â â€œI made the cardinal mistake of seeing a cute little furry animal in a pet store and I bought it,â€ she recalled. â€œI didnâ€™t know anything about them.â€Lamb founded and has operated The Nirvana Ridge Ferret Rescue since 1997. She opened the rescue soon after she got her first pet ferret after moving to Virginia from California where owning ferrets as pets is illegal. Over 2,000 ferrets have passed through Lambâ€™s Nirvana Ridge Ferret Rescue in Brandy Station. Margarita Orange Since then, over 2,000 ferrets have come through her door.California is one of two states that restricts ferret ownership - the other is Hawaii. The only way Californians can legaâ€¦

entry.title:
What Do Ferrets Eat?
The short answer: meat, bones, and organs.
The easiest way to venture a guess as to what a ferret should ...
entry.summary: What Do Ferrets Eat? The short answer: meat, bones, and organs. The easiest way to venture a guess as to what a ferret should eat is to look at their teeth. Does this ferretâ€™s mouth (above) remind you of any other animalsâ€™ mouths you may know? To me it looks an awful lot like a small dog or cat, NOT a rat or a mouse. These ferret's teeth are sharp in order to tear through the meat and bone of their prey! How cool! #ferret #ferrets #ferretsofinstagram(Feed generated with FetchRSS)

entry.title: Photos from The Modern Ferret's post
entry.summary: I had the absolute pleasure of presenting about ferrets to children in an organization called Royal Family Kids (which serves neglected and abused children in the foster care system). It was so fun to teach the kids something and make them laugh. This program has absolutely changed my life and touched my heart in ways I never wouldâ€™ve expected. â€œHe comforts us in all our troubles so that we can comfort others. When they are troubled, we will be able to give them the same comfort God has given us.â€ 1 Corinthians 1:4 #ferret #ferrets #ferretsofinstagram(Feed generated with FetchRSS)

entry.title: Tay-K Says He's Being Treated Like 'Hamster' and 'Ferret' Behind Bars - Complex
entry.summary: Tay-K is speaking out about the conditions he says heâ€™s enduring while behind bars, likening his treatment to that of a â€œhamsterâ€ and a â€œferret.â€To recap: Tay-K was sentenced to 55 years in prison in 2019 in connection with the shooting death conviction of 21-year-old Ethan Walker. On Tuesday, the â€œThe Raceâ€ artist updated fans via a three-tweet series of updates, starting with opening up about feeling as though heâ€™s â€œ[at] war within.â€From there, Tay-K addressed his treatment while incarcerated by bringing in the aforementioned hamster and ferret comparisons.â€œI feel like a hamster in here,â€ Tay-K said in one tweet. In another, he said he was â€œliterallyâ€ being treated â€œlike a ferret in here rn.â€See more below.Image via Tay-K on TwitterImage via Tay-K on TwitterImage via Tay-K on TwitterAs previously reported, Tay-K earlier this month questioned his 55-year sentence in a string of social media updates.â€œI bet if I was a lil white kid they wouldnâ€™t have gave me no 55 years for a crime I was alleged to play the most insignificant role in when I was 16â€¦.they woulda rightfully argued that my mind wasnâ€™t fully developed and gave me rehabilitation and a 2nd (1st) chance at adulthood,â€ he said at the time.Previous updates from Tay-K include a birthday-timed message on his 21st birthday in 2021, notably including comments about then-impending new music and his take on going platinum with his aforementioned hit â€œThe Race.â€ Read more at this link.

entry.title: Ferret on the Loose! â€“ West Side Rag - westsiderag.com
entry.summary: Get WSR FREE in your inbox Photograph by Shelley Goldberg.You canâ€™t say the Rag isnâ€™t ferreting out the news! Reader Shelley Goldberg sent us the following bulletin. â€œI walked out of Time Warner after shopping at Whole Foods and almost collided with it. Then about 30 people including me were taking pics and following it. It walked alongside the entire front of the mall, then darted under a cop car. Some animal-loving woman tried to lure it back but it crossed the road and ended up in Columbus Circle. The woman and a guard from Time Warner (on his phone alerting security) threw a coat over it but it ran out from under. By this point, the crowd grew and I left!Â No owner showed up. You never know!!â€
